### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE TeamSchedule (
    team_id INT,
    schedule_id INT,
    training_session_date DATE,
    training_session_time TIME,
    travel_arrangement VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (schedule_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE TeamSchedule SET training_session_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE schedule_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE team_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id UUID,
    training_session_id UUID,
    event_date DATE
);


CREATE TABLE travel_arrangements (
    travel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id UUID,
    travel_date DATE,
    destination VARCHAR(50)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE team_schedule SET training_session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
